EmailTemplate.name: SM-2019-01-11-MS EoS.ES - 1b.ES 1 - HTML Invite 1
EmailTemplate.subject: $10 Amazon Gift Card for 3 Minute Survey | 2019 IT Predictions
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[http://bit.ly/2019-predictions]]> Take Survey and Earn $10 Amazon Gift Card <[[http://bit.ly/2019-predictions]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Are you wondering what the top initiatives will be for IT organization's like yours in 2019?
Let's find out together. Take our 3-Minute 2019 Predictions Survey <[[http://bit.ly/2019-predictions]]> to help predict the future on the state of infrastructure optimization, cloud migration, containers and more.
Take Survey Now <[[http://bit.ly/2019-predictions]]>
As a thank you for your time, you will earn a $10 Amazon Gift Card upon completion of the survey. Furthermore, we are offering a $50 Amazon Gift Card for agreeing to a 30-minute meeting with a Turbonomic engineer.
Regards, Megan
